===Noun===
{{zh-noun}}

# [[lover]]; [[sweetheart]]

====Usage notes====
* In China mainland, {{zh-l|情人|tr=qíngrén|lover}} usually refers to a partner in an extramarital relationship except in {{zh-l|情人節|tr=qíngrénjié|Valentine's Day}}. For a person who loves, {{zh-l|愛人|lover}} is popular among elder people, while {{zh-l|戀人|lover}} is popular among young people.
